article_title: Chase, Powell vie for 11th District Virginia Senate seat
article_text:
Age: 64

Residence: Chesterfield County

Education: law degree, University of Richmond; master's degree in Spanish, University of Wisconsin-Madison; B.A. in Spanish/French from the University of Richmond

Career: Lawyer, president of Powell Law Group PC; former staff clerk, Virginia Supreme Court of Appeals; retired colonel, U.S. Army, with 30 years of service, five on active duty - commanded intelligence unit after Sept. 11.

Family: Married; four children, five grandchildren.

og.description: The race in Virginia’s 11th Senate District features two Chesterfield County residents who have never held public office but who are not strangers to politics.
